name: Vesper Totem
description:
Summon a totem at the target location for 30 sec. Your next 3 damage spells or abilities will cause the totem to radiate 4,426 Arcane damage to up to 6 enemies near the totem, and your next 3 healing spells will heal up to 6 allies near the totem for 4,931 health.

Casting this ability again while the totem is active will relocate the totem.
